docs.title: Welcome to the Cyber Eye
docs.text: Here is the guide to help you navigate through the repos and getting the project up and running.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
This is the whole project layout documentation which can help get the software to run.

  • Clonning the Github reopsitory
  • Installing Protege (Ontology Editor)
  • Installing Neo4j Desktop (GraphDB)
  • Running the Dashboard

docs.title: Cloning the GitHub repository
docs.text:
First remember that the repository has a submodule, so use the following git command:

git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/uol-feps-soc-comp3931-2324-classroom/final-year-project-ASHS21.git
